spoilers.name: Eddard Stark
spoilers.description: Lord of Winterfell - Warden of the North - Hand of the King - Married to Catelyn (Tully) Stark
spoilers.death_info: Beheaded by Ser Ilyn Payne at the order of Joffrey Baratheon

spoilers.name: Robb Stark
spoilers.description: Son of Eddard and Catelyn Stark - Direwolf: Grey Wind
spoilers.death_info: Shot by a Frey crossbowman and then stabbed through the heart by Roose Bolton at the Red Wedding

spoilers.name: Tywin Lannister
spoilers.description: Lord of Casterly Rock - Warden of the West
spoilers.death_info: Shot on the toilet by Tyrion with a crossbow

spoilers.name: Viserys Targaryen
spoilers.description: The Beggar King - Son of Aerys II Targaryen "The Mad King"
spoilers.death_info: Khal Drogo pours molten gold on his head at Daenerys’ command

spoilers.name: Oberyn Martel
spoilers.death_info: Skull crushed by the Mountain in a trial by combat

spoilers.name: Khal Drogo
spoilers.description: Leader of the Dothraki people - Dothraki Warlord - Married to Daenerys Targaryen
spoilers.death_info: Smothered by Daenerys Targaryen in a mercy killing after a spell by Mirri Maz Duur leaves him in a catatonic state

spoilers.name: Stannis Baratheon
spoilers.description: Lord of Dragonstone - Master of Ships - Brother of Robert Baratheon

spoilers.name: Catelyn Stark
spoilers.description: Married to Eddard Stark - Daughter of Hoster Tully
spoilers.death_info: Throat slit by Black Walder Rivers at the Red Wedding

spoilers.name: King Robert Baratheon
spoilers.description: The first of his name - Lord of the Seven Kingdoms
spoilers.death_info: Mortally wounded by a wild boar after drinking wine given to him by Lancel Lannister at Cersei Lannister’s command
